Constants

Jugl

All classes and methods are contained in the Jugl namespace.  This is defined in an anonymous function to deal with the single file build case.

Summary
Jugl
All classes and methods are contained in the Jugl namespace.
Properties
prefix
{String} The namespace URI alias for attributes that act as Jugl statements.
namespaceURI
{String} The namespace URI for attributes that act as Jugl statements.
xmlns
{String} Only HTML docs are currently supported, this property is reserved for XML doc support.
scriptName
Private.  {String} The relative path to this script
Functions
getScriptLocation
Private.  Get the path for all library scripts
